original_text: Jesus said to him, ‘If you want to be completely good, then you must do this: You must sell everything that you have. Then give the money to poor people. If you do that, you will have many valuable things in heaven. Then come back and be my disciple.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 네가 온전하고자 할진대 가서 네 소유를 팔아 가난한 자들에게 주라 그리하면 하늘에서 보화가 네게 있으리라 그리고 와서 나를 따르라 하시니

sentences.original_text: If you want to be completely good
You must sell everything that you have
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 가진 모든 것을 팔아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Then give the money to poor people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 돈을 가난한 사람들에게 주어라

sentences.original_text: you will have many valuable things in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 하늘에서 많은 귀중한 것을 갖게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then come back and be my disciple
